author: jfthomps
msg: minor changes to errors.php and statistics.php
vm.php: modified AJnewProfile - get imageid for 'noimage' before doing insert instead of hard coding image id 4

author: erans
msg: Doc fix (description of release 2.2 was missing).

author: jfthomps
msg: modified AJtoggleBlockTime - now we actually delete entries from the request table if the start time has not been reached instead of updating the state to be deleted.  It's been a while since I did this, but I think the reason was that the deleted stated ended up causing the machines to get picked up by the reload algorthim.
modified AJupdateBlockStatus - updated to check for computer being in 'reload' state in addition to 'reloading' state
